title: 玩家使用指令提示延迟
author: Super_SA
txt_content:
偶尔使用指令会出现如下提示 Permissions lag notice with (GenericVaultHandler). Response took 711.896200ms. Summary: Getting group for qwl337
[12:01:38] [Server thread/INFO]: qwl337 issued server command: /back复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 正常，那个玩家使用的 /back 指令，传送后需要加载区块，自然会导致一定的延迟，所以一般都搞个延时以防滥用。
